full_summary:
# Enclosed Trailers Procurement

## Title
The Government of Canada invites suppliers to submit their bids for the procurement of Enclosed Cargo Trailers in accordance with the Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR.

## Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-5720-71134081
* **Tender Publication Date**: 2023-05-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-07T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-06-07

## Description
The Department of National Defence requires the supply of two (2) Enclosed Cargo Trailers along with related items. The requested delivery date for the goods is 120 days after the contract signing.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Officer**: Victor Shepstone
* **Email**: victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone Number**: (819) 939-3040

## Important Dates and Notes

* The notice is published for a period of 15 calendar days.
* The procurement process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR.
* Suppliers who wish to become pre-qualified suppliers can refer to [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996)
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers for any procurement needs.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: I removed all the fields that were repeated and focused on providing relevant information. I also attempted to make it more concise while maintaining a professional tone. Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.  (max char 400)  Remember to format your output in nice markdown format as you originally requested. 

Also, there were no attachments in the original documents. Commented out for future reference
